About

This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: github.com/jglovier/jekyll-new

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll

Proviso

  • Proviso
  • your-email@domain.com

Proviso is a Quality Assurance platform that lets your team test features on your site while in development, helping you get feedback while you’re working.
